title: remove tmp_install from _C include path
body_html:
This is step 1 of moving compilation of _C into the cmake layer. Prior
to this diff, files installed by the cmake build were #included by the
_C build. This will no longer make sense when the two are unified - a
cmake build can't depend on the result of its own installation.

Therefore I replace all include paths that reference tmp_install with
paths that reference source or build directories.
body_text:
This is step 1 of moving compilation of _C into the cmake layer. Prior

Therefore I replace all include paths that reference tmp_install with
paths that reference source or build directories.
body:
This is step 1 of moving compilation of _C into the cmake layer. Prior
to this diff, files installed by the cmake build were #included by the
_C build. This will no longer make sense when the two are unified - a
cmake build can't depend on the result of its own installation.

Therefore I replace all include paths that reference tmp_install with
paths that reference source or build directories.
